duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the management of buildings, including maintenance services and outside contractors/vendors.
Liaison with the Board of Directors and advise them from time to time.
Handle all delinquent accounts promptly and place into collections if necessary.
Assist in the creation of budgets for each Association and review accounting and financial statements.

education_certification.credential: Community Association Manager's (CAM) license or Real Estate Agent/Broker's license. Currently working towards obtaining either of them.
